attributes.action: Stop killing women in the name of honour
attributes.additional_details: This will help push out the beliefs of honour killings and help bring it to a complete end within the next few generations
attributes.background: Enforcing harsher punishments towards those who commit honour killings

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about so-called 'honour' killing, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Murder is already a criminal offence, and if a person is found guilty of murder, a court must give them a life sentence.
